Mapper is a Quiz app which is an Educational App especially for kid, where they can improve their knowledge of Different country's flag as well as Different Indian Government Organisations/Symbols plus they also have additional important General Information about the countries and the organisations.

1.) For Each Question, the player will get 10 seconds and 5 points for each correct answer, 3 points for each Almost Correct answer and -1 points will be deducted for incorrect answer. 
 2.) At the end if the total time taken by the player is greater than the total time calculated by the formula total questions * 10 seconds per question, then for per extra 10 seconds your 3 points will be deducted.
 3.) You can choose to play the sound or mute it.
 4.) The timer will be paused once you submit a question successfully after that you can read the question's info and all.
 5.) Maximum time to finish the game is 5 minutes, after which the game will be over.
